channel.title: How to add single combat attack on npc Delta 317
channel.description:
How to add single combat attack on npc Delta 317 Delta Base. To do so that I could only attack one enemy ?
Image [spoiler][img]http://i.imgur.com/XwDsCSF.gif[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: How to add single combat attack on npc Delta 317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your server should be setting a value for the npc and the player showing who they’re in combat with (Usually the id of the player/npc respectively).

Add in a flag to check if the player is already in combat via checking if their variable is set to above -1; and also check if there’s any npc with their variable set to the id of the player.

If that boolean returns true, don’t allow another npc to attack the player.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add single combat attack on npc Delta 317
